rules_text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner’s hand.
Exile the top three cards of your library, then choose one. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
Choose any number of creature cards you own from outside the game and put them onto the battlefield.
special_text:
[+2]: Until your next turn, target nonland permanent phases out.
[-3]: Exile the top three cards of your library, then choose one. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
[-10]: Choose any number of creature cards you own from outside the game and put them onto the battlefield.
